ooC: There aren't really any cities in the sense you're thinking. 
The Predacon base (And any other base for that matter) is a ship 
which crashed on the planet. It was initially a Maximal Freighter, 
but Megatron stole it. There are Pred logos on it now thought. =)

-- Switchblade --

Switchblade was still waiting for Phoenix when the Pred base's 
sensors alerted him of Tyrant's presence in front of the base.

"Hold on." He says, as he transforms back into robot mode.

Seeing that the bot was possibly lost, and wasn't showing hostile 
intent, he figured that he should exchange a few words. He hops down 
and walks over to the other bot.

"Hey... what's your name and what is your faction?" Says 
Switchblade, ready to retreat and open fire with the auto cannons.
